body_html: mxnet may be faster, but this script is not timing it properly (there are no necessary synchronizations, even with CUDA_LAUNCH_BLOCKING=1 it is not calling any convolution kernel for a thousand times, which it should), so we have no idea what mxnet's actual performance is.
body_text: mxnet may be faster, but this script is not timing it properly (there are no necessary synchronizations, even with CUDA_LAUNCH_BLOCKING=1 it is not calling any convolution kernel for a thousand times, which it should), so we have no idea what mxnet's actual performance is.
body: mxnet may be faster, but this script is not timing it properly (there are no necessary synchronizations, even with CUDA_LAUNCH_BLOCKING=1 it is not calling *any* convolution kernel for a thousand times, which it should), so we have no idea what mxnet's actual performance is.
